quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Choose the correct passive voice: 'The teacher praised the student.'
options: The student was praised by the teacher.
The student has been praised by the teacher.
The student is praised by the teacher.
The student was being praised by the teacher.
quiz.answer: The student was praised by the teacher.

quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Identify the correct indirect speech: 'She said, "I have completed the work."'
options: She said that she completed the work.
She said that she has completed the work.
She said that she had completed the work.
She said that she was completing the work.
quiz.answer: She said that she had completed the work.

quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Choose the correct option: 'He is not only intelligent ____ also hardworking.'

quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: What is the synonym of 'ephemeral'?

quiz.subject: English
quiz.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: She did not knew the answer.
She did not know the answer.
She does not knew the answer.
She does not knows the answer.
quiz.answer: She did not know the answer.
